title: Identification of small molecules that are synthetically lethal upon knockout of the RNA ligase Rlig1 in human cells
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00125G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Florian M. Stumpf, Silke Müller, Andreas Marx
Six unique compounds were found to be synthetically lethal in combination with Rlig1-KO in HEK293 cells. In addition, several naphthoquinones, which are similar to menadione, were evaluated in this context.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
